headline.main: LABOR STRONGHOLD ACCLAIMS PETAIN; Reception in Saint-Etienne Is Viewed as Endorsement of Policies by Workers HE TELLS OF SOCIAL LAWS Marshal Indicates Corporative Set-up -- Bishop Likens Visit to That of Charles VII

lead_paragraph: VICHY, France, March 2 -- Marshal Henri Philippe Petain was back in Vichy tonight from a two-day tour of inspection that took him to the industrial section around Saint-Etienne and the agricultural section around Le Puy.
abstract: hailed at St Etienne and Le Puy
snippet: VICHY, France, March 2 -- Marshal Henri Philippe Petain was back in Vichy tonight from a two-day tour of inspection that took him to the industrial section around Saint-Etienne and the agricultural section around Le Puy....

byline.original: By G.H. ARCHAMBAULTWireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES
